reviews.review: idk what im talking about this game is fine
This game set the bench mark for coop team play. Great memmories from back in 1999. Is still fun. Got this as I never owned an orignal copy. This game is also the reason we have steam apparently.

Definitely much better than any other modern fps games out there. Can run on even very low specs, occupies very less space compared to the ridiculous amount of space required by other modern games and has a very active community for good competition and feedback. What is more to expect from a game ? This game is immortal !!! All hail immortal old cs !!!

abe cs:go e za pozori i mishki be.E tva e shibanata igra bate.Kur za dvoikite,vinagi edinica cukam,na Qrd gi praim mazalo smeshkite  1v1  gi pruskam ne moga se zapra prosto.Kur za hiksa koito cuka.kur za flashkite.kur za strategiite brat.kur za shtitosanite bonaci.samo ak i deagle momche.Trea si muj v toq jivot i za tva kupuvai tva.
